00035 using namespace std;
00036 using namespace birdseed::dev;

00038 static const double MIN_VARIANCE = 1e-14;
00039 
00040 static void floorClusterWeights(Clusters *clusters, int verbosity)
00041 {
00042     // Make sure all weights are above minimum
00043     for (size_t i = 0; i < clusters->weights.size(); ++i) {
00044         clusters->weights[i] = max(clusters->weights[i], final_weight_min);
00045     }
00046     if (verbosity >= 2) {
00047         cout << "After weight min: " << clusters->tostring() << "\n";
00048     }
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 static CallAndConfidence doCall(const PXI_ZJMatrix::ROW &pxi_zj,
00053                                 bool isDiploid,
00054                                 const IntensityMatrix::ROW &intensities,
00055                                 const Clusters &clusters,
00056                                 const Matrix2x2 *B,
00057                                 const string &priorName)
00058 {
00059     int biggest = -1;
00060     int nextBiggest = -1;
00061     double biggestVal = -INFINITY;
00062     double nextBiggestVal = -INFINITY;
00063     for (size_t i = 0; i < pxi_zj.size(); ++i) {
00064         if (pxi_zj[i] > biggestVal) {
00065             nextBiggest = biggest;
00066             nextBiggestVal = biggestVal;
00067             biggest = i;
00068             biggestVal = pxi_zj[i];
00069         } else if (pxi_zj[i] > nextBiggestVal) {
00070             nextBiggest = i;
00071             nextBiggestVal = pxi_zj[i];
00072         }
00073     }
00074 
00075     double pvalues[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS];
00076     memset(pvalues, 0, sizeof(pvalues));
00077 
00078     //
00079     if ((biggest==-1)||(nextBiggest==-1)) {
00080       // dump pxi_zj
00081 //      printf("pxi_zj[%d]=[",(int)index);
00082 //      for (size_t i = 0; i < pxi_zj.size(); ++i) {
00083 //        printf("%s%f",((i!=0)?",":""),pxi_zj[i]);
00084 //      }
00085 //      printf("]\n");
00086       //
00087       return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 0.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00088     }
00089 
00090     for (size_t i = 0; i < pxi_zj.size(); ++i) {
00091         // apt-probeset-genotype want a higher value to mean lower likelihood
00092         pvalues[i] = 1 - pxi_zj[i];
00093     }
00094 
00095     if (pxi_zj[biggest] <= 0) {
00096         cerr << "WARNING: pxi_zj[biggest] is not positive: " << pxi_zj[biggest] << " for " << priorName << endl;
00097     }
00098     
00099     double confidence;
00100     if (pxi_zj[biggest] > 0) {
00101         confidence = pxi_zj[nextBiggest] / pxi_zj[biggest];
00102         double confidenceRelativeToCluster =
00103             calculateConfidenceRelativeToCluster(B[biggest],
00104                                                  intensities,
00105                                                  clusters.means[biggest]);
00106         confidence = confidence * relative_distance_confidence_weight +
00107             confidenceRelativeToCluster * (1.0 - relative_distance_confidence_weight);
00108     } else {
00109         confidence = 1.0;
00110     }
00111 
00112     if (isDiploid) {
00113         switch (biggest) {
00114         case Priors::AA_INDEX:
00115             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::AA, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00116         case Priors::AB_INDEX:
00117             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::AB, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00118         case Priors::BB_INDEX:
00119             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::BB, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00120         default:
00121             assert(false);
00122             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 0.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00123         }
00124     } else {
00125         switch (biggest) {
00126         case Priors::A_INDEX:
00127             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::AA, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00128         case Priors::B_INDEX:
00129             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::BB, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00130         default:
00131             assert(false);
00132             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 0.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 static void doCalls(vector<CallAndConfidence> *calls,
00138                     const Clusters &clusters,
00139                     const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00140                     bool isDiploid,
00141                     const string &priorName,
00142                     size_t verbosity)
00143 {
00144     size_t numClusters = (isDiploid? MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS: MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS - 1);
00145     PXI_ZJMatrix pxi_zj(intensities.numRows(), numClusters);
00146     calculatePXI_ZJ(&pxi_zj, clusters, intensities, numClusters);
00147 
00148     Matrix2x2 B[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS];
00149     for (size_t i = 0; i < numClusters; ++i) {
00150         B[i] = makeBMatrix(clusters.vars[i], clusters.covar);
00151     }
00152 
00153     calls->reserve(intensities.numRows());
00154     for (size_t i = 0; i < intensities.numRows(); ++i) {
00155         calls->push_back(doCall(pxi_zj[i], isDiploid, intensities[i], clusters, B, priorName));
00156     }
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 static void adjustPriors(Priors *priors, const IntensityMatrix &intensities, double correctionFactor)
00161 {
00162     double squared = correctionFactor * correctionFactor;
00163 
00164     bool seenNonZeroObservations = false;
00165     for (size_t i = 0; i < priors->getNumPriors(); ++i) {
00166         priors->getPrior(i).m_mean = priors->getPrior(i).m_mean * correctionFactor;
00167         priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix = priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix * squared;
00168         priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[0][0] =
00169             max(priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[0][0], MIN_VARIANCE);
00170         priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[1][1] =
00171             max(priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[1][1], MIN_VARIANCE);
00172 
00173         if (priors->getPrior(i).m_numObservations > 0) {
00174             seenNonZeroObservations = true;
00175         }
00176     }
00177     if (!seenNonZeroObservations) {
00178         for (size_t i = 0; i < priors->getNumPriors(); ++i) {
00179             // Don't allow numObservations to be zero, to avoid get NaNs from FP arithmetic
00180             priors->getPrior(i).m_numObservations = 1;
00181         }
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 BasicGenotypeCaller::BasicGenotypeCaller(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00186                                          const Priors &priors,
00187                                          double correctionFactor,
00188                                          const string &priorName,
00189                                          int verbosity,
00190                                          std::ostream *clusterOstrm):
00191     calls(),
00192     index(0)
00193 {
00194     if (intensities.numRows() < MIN_SAMPLES_TO_CLUSTER) {
00195         std::stringstream strm;
00196         strm << "Not enough samples to clusters.  " << MIN_SAMPLES_TO_CLUSTER << " are needed but there are only " <<
00197             intensities.numRows() << ".";
00198         throw BroadException(strm.str().c_str(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00199     }
00200     
00201     setFitSNPGaussiansVerbosity(verbosity);
00202     if (correctionFactor < 0) {
00203         correctionFactor = calculateSNPSpecificCorrectionFactor(intensities, priors);
00204         if (verbosity >= 2) {
00205             cout.precision(10);
00206             cout << "SNP-specific correction factor for " << priorName << "=" << correctionFactor << endl;
00207         }
00208     }
00209     Priors adjustedPriors(priors);
00210     adjustPriors(&adjustedPriors, intensities, correctionFactor);
00211     if (verbosity >= 2) {
00212         cout << "Priors\n";
00213         for (size_t i = 0; i < adjustedPriors.getNumPriors(); ++i) {
00214             const Prior &prior = adjustedPriors.getPrior(i);
00215             cout << prior.m_mean[0] << " " << prior.m_mean[1] << " " << prior.m_covarMatrix[0][0] << " "
00216                  << " " << prior.m_covarMatrix[1][0] << " " << prior.m_covarMatrix[1][1] << " "
00217                  << prior.m_numObservations << endl;
00218         }
00219     }
00220     
00221     Clusters clusters = FitSNPGaussianPriors3(intensities, adjustedPriors);
00222     if (clusterOstrm != NULL) {
00223         (*clusterOstrm) << priorName << clusters.standardClusterString() << endl;
00224     }
00225     floorClusterWeights(&clusters, verbosity);
00226     doCalls(&calls, clusters, intensities, priors.isDiploid(), priorName, verbosity);
00227 }
00228 
00229 double DummyGenotypeCaller::pvalues[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00230 
00231 CallAndConfidence DummyGenotypeCaller::nextCall()
00232 {
00233     return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 1.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00234 }
00235 
00236 ForcedClusterGenotypeCaller::ForcedClusterGenotypeCaller(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00237                                                          const Clusters &clusters,
00238                                                          double correctionFactor,
00239                                                          const std::string &priorName,
00240                                                          int verbosity,
00241                                                          std::ostream *clusterOstrm):
00242     calls(),
00243     index(0)
00244 {
00245     bool isDiploid = clusters.k == MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS;
00246     Clusters flooredClusters(clusters);
00247     if (clusterOstrm != NULL) {
00248         (*clusterOstrm) << priorName << clusters.standardClusterString() << endl;
00249     }
00250     floorClusterWeights(&flooredClusters, verbosity);
00251     doCalls(&calls, flooredClusters, intensities, isDiploid, priorName, verbosity);
00252 }
